data.name: Transparent Lego Flower (Red)
data.description: An everlasting lego rose with a beautiful, glassy look to express your deep feelings for someone.

data.name: Lego Flower (Pink)
data.description: A lego pink rose for the sweetest person in your life forevermore.

data.name: Lego Flower (Blue)
data.description: A lego blue rose for someone with eternal elegance.

data.name: Foil Flower (Purple)
data.description: Ethereal and iridescent. These flowers feature a holographic foil finish that shimmers and changes shades as they move in the light. Available in Mystery Purple, they add a magical, dreamy vibe to any arrangement.

data.name: Foil Flower (White)
data.description: Ethereal and iridescent. These flowers feature a holographic foil finish that shimmers and changes shades as they move in the light. Available in Pearlescent White, they add a magical, dreamy vibe to any arrangement.

data.name: Crochet Flower (Light Pink)
data.description: A soft light pink crochet flower handmade for a cozy and heartfelt feel.

data.name: Crochet Flower (Yellow)
data.description: A cheerful yellow crochet flower that radiates warmth and happiness.

data.name: Crochet Flower (Red)
data.description: A vibrant red crochet flower symbolizing love and passion.

data.name: Chiikawa Magnetic Couple Keychain
data.description: An adorable Chiikawa magnetic keychain set for cute pairs that sticks together when close.

data.name: Dog Magnetic Couple Keychain
data.description: Puppy love, literally. Two distinct dog designs that share a magnetic connection. Perfect for couples or besties who want a low-key but matching accessory for their bags or keys.

data.name: Couple Bracelet Tangled
data.description: Premium Pick. Inspired by the "new dream" of Rapunzel and Flynn. These woven bracelets feature intricate detailing and a design that symbolizes an unbreakable, adventurous bond.

data.name: Couple Bracelet Yin and Yang
data.description: Balance in harmony. A classic set featuring black and white cords with the Yin & Yang charms. Represents two opposites that complete each other perfectly.

data.name: Couple Bracelet Bear and Rabbit
data.description: Sweet and subtle. One bracelet features a cute Bear charm, the other a Rabbit. It’s the ultimate "soft couple" aesthetic accessory.

data.name: Acrylic Flower Clamps
data.description: Clear acrylic flower clamps that add a playful floral touch to your hair or accessories.

data.name: Flower Clamps (Pink)
data.description: Pink flower hair clamps for a soft and feminine look.

data.name: Flower Clamps (Blue)
data.description: Blue flower hair clamps that add a cool and stylish accent.

data.name: Flower Clamps (Purple)
data.description: Purple flower hair clamps for an elegant pop of color.

data.name: Casette Recorder (Red)
data.description: This isn't just a toy—it's a mini voice recorder! Record a short, sweet message (like "I love you" or a funny inside joke) that plays back when the button is pressed. A retro way to speak your heart.

data.name: Casette Recorder (Blue)
data.description: This isn't just a toy—it's a mini voice recorder! Record a short, sweet message (like "I love you" or a funny inside joke) that plays back when the button is pressed. A retro way to speak your heart.

data.name: Octopus Reversible Plushie (Light Blue & Blue)
data.description: What’s your mood today? These viral plushies flip inside out to reveal a different color. Soft, squishy, and perfect for cuddling.

data.name: Octopus Reversible Plushie (Blue & Pink)
data.description: What’s your mood today? These viral plushies flip inside out to reveal a different color. Soft, squishy, and perfect for cuddling.

data.name: Red Rose
data.description: The universal symbol of love, reimagined to last forever. Each rose features tightly woven petals that mimic the unfolding beauty of a fresh bloom. Whether you are building a romantic bouquet or just need a single stem to say "I care," this timeless classic is the perfect centerpiece.

data.name: x Rose
data.description: The universal symbol of love, reimagined to last forever. Each rose features tightly woven petals that mimic the unfolding beauty of a fresh bloom. Whether you are building a romantic bouquet or just need a single stem to say "I care," this timeless classic is the perfect centerpiece.

data.name: y Rose
data.description: The universal symbol of love, reimagined to last forever. Each rose features tightly woven petals that mimic the unfolding beauty of a fresh bloom. Whether you are building a romantic bouquet or just need a single stem to say "I care," this timeless classic is the perfect centerpiece.

data.name: x Carnation
data.description: Soft, textured, and full of charm. These carnations capture the intricate, ruffled look of the real thing without ever wilting. Symbolizing fascination and gratitude, they add a wonderful depth and "fluffiness" to any arrangement, making your bouquet look fuller and more detailed.

data.name: y Carnation
data.description: Soft, textured, and full of charm. These carnations capture the intricate, ruffled look of the real thing without ever wilting. Symbolizing fascination and gratitude, they add a wonderful depth and "fluffiness" to any arrangement, making your bouquet look fuller and more detailed.

data.name: z Carnation
data.description: Soft, textured, and full of charm. These carnations capture the intricate, ruffled look of the real thing without ever wilting. Symbolizing fascination and gratitude, they add a wonderful depth and "fluffiness" to any arrangement, making your bouquet look fuller and more detailed.

data.name: x Tulip
data.description: Sleek, sophisticated, and gracefully tall. Our premium tulips are designed for those who prefer a minimalist, modern aesthetic. With their clean lines and smooth silhouette, these blooms act as the "tall girl" of the group, adding elegance and height that instantly elevates the value of your bundle.

data.name: y Tulip
data.description: Sleek, sophisticated, and gracefully tall. Our premium tulips are designed for those who prefer a minimalist, modern aesthetic. With their clean lines and smooth silhouette, these blooms act as the "tall girl" of the group, adding elegance and height that instantly elevates the value of your bundle.

data.name: x Gerbera
data.description: Bold, bright, and impossible to ignore. With its wide, open face and intricate center details, the Gerbera is the "sunshine" of any arrangement. It is larger than our standard blooms, making it a fantastic statement piece that adds immediate volume and a happy, playful energy to your bundle.

data.name: y Gerbera
data.description: Bold, bright, and impossible to ignore. With its wide, open face and intricate center details, the Gerbera is the "sunshine" of any arrangement. It is larger than our standard blooms, making it a fantastic statement piece that adds immediate volume and a happy, playful energy to your bundle.

data.name: x Flower X (??)
data.description: The perfect accent to complete the look. This premium bloom offers a unique shape and texture that breaks the monotony of standard round flowers. Whether used as a secondary focal point or a high-end filler, it bridges the gap between the foliage and the centerpiece, giving your bouquet a professionally styled, cohesive finish.

data.name: Rose Bouquet
data.description: The ultimate gesture of romance and love. This bouquet features three of our tightly woven, focal Roses. It’s a timeless arrangement that looks elegant in any color combination. Perfect for dates, anniversaries, or just to make someone feel special.

data.name: Carnation Bouquet
data.description: Soft, fluffy, and full of charm. This bouquet highlights the intricate ruffled layers of three Carnations. It offers a "fuller" look than the roses and feels sweet and friendly. A great choice for best friends, mothers, or "congratulations" gifts.

data.name: Tulip Bouquet
data.description: Sleek, sophisticated, and modern. This bouquet features three of our tall Premium Tulips. With their clean lines and smooth silhouette, this arrangement offers a "Korean-style" aesthetic that stands out from the crowd.

data.name: The "Cuddles & Blooms"
data.description: Cute, colorful, and impossible to resist! This playful bundle combines a trio of our handcrafted blooms with a soft, squishy octopus plushie. It is the perfect "little something" to make someone smile—flowers they can keep forever and a plushie to hug when they miss you.

data.name: The "Linked Hearts"
data.description: Wear your heart on your sleeve—literally. This set steps it up with four beautiful focal flowers and a pair of magnetic couple bracelets. Whether you choose the balanced "Yin Yang" or the adorable "Bear & Rabbit," this bundle is all about connection.

data.name: The "Serenade" Set
data.description: A gift that speaks (or sings) volumes. This mixed bouquet features the elegance of a tall Tulip framed by two classic blooms. Paired with a special Audio keepsake, this bundle is designed for sentimental moments where words—and lyrics—matter most.

data.name: The "Glow Up" Konvy Bundle
data.description: The ultimate self-care treat! We’ve partnered with Konvy to bring you a "Beauty & Blooms" package. It features a stunning handcrafted bouquet alongside a complete makeup essential kit. Perfect for the girl who loves to look good and feel appreciated. Grab it before it’s gone!
